articles.author: Jennifer Korn, Donie O'Sullivan
articles.title: Elon Musk delays $8 'blue check' Twitter verification plan until after the midterms - CNN
articles.description: Twitter is delaying the rollout of account verifications for its paid Twitter Blue subscription plan until after the midterm elections, a source with knowledge of the decision confirmed to CNN.
articles.content:
Twitter is delaying the rollout of account verifications for its paid Twitter Blue subscription plan until after the midterm elections, a source with knowledge of the decision confirmed to CNN.

articles.title: Launch of SS Sally Ride Space Station Supply Mission CRS-18 (Official NASA Broadcast) - NASA
China's trade unexpectedly shrinks as COVID curbs, global slowdown jolt demand - Reuters
articles.description: China's exports and imports unexpectedly contracted in October, the first simultaneous slump since May 2020, as a perfect storm of COVID curbs at home and global recession risks dented demand and further darkened the outlook for a struggling economy.
articles.content: BEIJING, Nov 7 (Reuters) - China's exports and imports unexpectedly contracted in October, the first simultaneous slump since May 2020, as a perfect storm of COVID curbs at home and global recession … [+4196 chars]

articles.title: How to play Powerball ahead of record $1.9 billion jackpot drawing - USA TODAY
articles.description: A record-shattering $1.9 billion jackpot is tempting those who normally pass on playing the lotter. Here is how to play Powerball.
articles.content:
The Powerball jackpot keeps growing.
